knimeNode.name: Many2One
knimeNode.shortDescription: Aggregates several columns into one single column.

fullDescription.intro: Aggregates several columns into one single column. Selects a matching column from the selected columns and puts the name of the matching column into the aggregated column of that row. Dependend on the selected "include method" a column matches the include pattern for each row. Then the name of that column is put into the aggregated column, i.e. the aggregated column contains the column names of the selected columns. If no column matches a missing value is added. If multiple columns match an exception is thrown. Missing values are ignored. If all selected columns of one row consist of missing values a missing value is put in the aggregated column. All include methods except the regular expression require columns which are double compatible.
fullDescription.option: Select those columns which should be condensed.

Choose the method to determine the matching column:
Maximum: The column with the maximum value in each row matches
Minimum: The column with the minimum value in each row matches
RegExpPattern: The column matching the provided regular expression pattern matches.
Enter the regular expression pattern if RexExpPattern was chosen as include method
If checked, the selected columns are kept in the output table, otherwise they are deleted.
